biocontainers.name: dreamtools
biocontainers.summary: Scoring functions for the dream / sage challenges

biotools.summary: DREAMTools is a Python package for evaluating DREAM challenge scoring metrics. DREAMTools provides a command line interface that enables researchers to test new methods on past challenges, as well as a framework for scoring new challenges.

bioschemas.name: DREAMTools
bioschemas.summary: DREAMTools is a Python package for evaluating DREAM challenge scoring metrics. DREAMTools provides a command line interface that enables researchers to test new methods on past challenges, as well as a framework for scoring new challenges.
